title: Is President Obama Playa Bargan the arms dealer Dontray Mills?
subtitle: Duntry Mills was charged with 55 weapons smuggling offences and escaped from prison because he was monitored by a federal judge, not because President Obama bargained with him.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A man named Dontry Mills was convicted of several weapons smuggling crimes, but he was pardoned by President Obama.
